title: EFL make decision on changing rules after Pep Guardiola complained about Marc Guehi missing Carabao Cup final
tags: Guardiola demands football rule change despite Man City beating Newcastle to make Carabao Cup final;EFL side kicked out of competition and given big fine after breaking football rules;Pep Guardiola told 'stick to football' by Jewish groups over Gaza outburst as 'Man City let down';The GB News Editorial Charter
